ISSUE.TITLE: Removing xxxExt and xxxExtOverride
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I would like to know why is the reason of maintening both a OwnerRepository and a OwnerRepositoryExt interface? I suppose you didn't want to modify the original classes. But for a beginner, I found the persistance layer very complex. I think we could merge it. Don't you?
